name: Rush On
description:
Reach the end, and be quick! Rush On is an intense runner experience in which you avoid death while dashing through beautiful abstract landscapes. This game respects your time by offering adrenaline-fueled excitement right from the start. It's super easy to learn and offers you new procedurally generated challenges every time you start.


What to expect

  • Satisfying, fast and intense gameplay that you can pick up easily
  • An endless amount of generated levels
  • An ending
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Pretty colors
  • Being able to replay and share seeds of runs

What not

  • Multiplayer
  • A soundtrack
  • Story
  • Combat
  • Puzzles



Rush On was made by one person. It's a fairly small game. The idea is to offer a reduced-to-the-essence experience that is polished and fun. It's great for a quick session to relax your mind, but it does not try to compare itself to bigger games in terms of depth.

I'm happy to hear from you! Send me a mail if you have problems, questions or feedback. I'm getting back to you as fast as possible.

Hope you'll enjoy the game!

Julian
